attributes.title: Terrible App!!
attributes.review: Everything about this app is slow. The loading screens, the text, even the people who legitimately use it. It took forever to download and I ran out of all of my data! I'm going back to tiktok no thanks trump.

attributes.title: I HATE IT SO MUCH

Thank god when I deleted it, it went back to normal. I thought I would have to go to the Apple Store in the middle of a pandemic. DONT MAKE MY MISTAKE. DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT PLEASEEEE.
